```{r}

library(targets)
```

```{r}
tar_load(c(projections_all_sm, config))

```

```{r}

gas_dataset <- group_gas_breakout_dataset(projections_all_sm, config)
gas_breakout_df <- gen_gas_breakout(gas_dataset,config,config$gas_order)

```

```{r}
sector_dataset <- group_sector_breakout_dataset(projections_all_sm, config)
sector_breakout_df <- gen_sector_breakout_df(sector_dataset, config, config$sector_order)

```



```{r}
lulucf_sink_breakout <- lulucf_sink_breakout(projections_all_sm, config)

```



```{r}

# Total Gross emissions
total_gross_emissions_df <- summarise_emissions(gas_breakout_df)
  



```

```{r}

total_net_emissions <- get_total_net_emissions(gas_breakout_df, lulucf_sink_breakout)

```

```{r}


gas_table_df <- create_gas_table_df(
  gas_breakout_df,
  total_gross_emissions_df,
  lulucf_sink_breakout,
  total_net_emissions
)


sector_table_df <- create_sector_table_df(
  sector_breakout_df,
  total_gross_emissions_df,
  lulucf_sink_breakout,
  total_net_emissions
)


```
